summary: A young student is devastated when he finds that his girlfriend is cheating on him. In order to find out why she did it, he decides to spy on her and her lover.
cast: Philippe Marlaud|Marie Rivière|Anne-Laure Meury|Mathieu Carrière|Philippe Caroit|Coralie Clément|María Luisa García|Haydée Caillot|Mary Stephen|Neil Chan|Rosette|Fabrice Luchini
title: La mujer del aviador o es mejor no pensar en nada (Comedias y proverbios)
